Control.Title: Cartesian Charts
Control.Description: Plot over seven chart types with extensive features like data label and zooming.

Sample.Title: Default column chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the default column chart. The data point information is shown using data label support.

Sample.Title: Column with track
Sample.Description: This sample renders the column chart with a track.

Sample.Title: Default bar chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the default bar chart by transposing the column chart. The data point information is shown using data label support.

Sample.Title: Default line chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the default line chart. The marker, tooltip, and legend are enabled in the model. Tap the data point to view information about that data point in a tooltip.

Sample.Title: Line with dashes
Sample.Description: This sample showcases a rendered line chart with dashes.

Sample.Title: Default spline chart
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the default spline chart. The marker, tooltip, and legend are enabled in the model. Tap the data point to view information about that data point in a tooltip.

Sample.Title: Spline with dashes
Sample.Description: This sample showcases a rendered spline chart with dashes.

Sample.Title: Real-time line chart
Sample.Description: The sample demonstrates the live chart. A new data point is added at the end, and a point is removed at the start of a certain time.

Sample.Title: Vertical live chart
Sample.Description: The sample demonstrates the live chart. A new data point is continuously added at the end of a certain time interval.

Sample.Title: Data point selection
Sample.Description: This sample depicts the data point selection feature in the chart. On mobile, tap the data points, and on desktop, click the data points to select or deselect them.

Sample.Title: Series selection
Sample.Description: This sample depicts the series selection feature in the chart. On mobile, tap the data points, and on desktop, click the data points to select or deselect them.

Sample.Title: Tooltip
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the tooltip feature. On mobile, tap the data points, and on desktop, mouse over to the data points to raise the tooltip.

Sample.Title: Trackball
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the trackball feature. On mobile, long press on the chart to show the trackball, and drag the chart to change the position of the trackball continuously. On the desktop, you can move the cursor over the chart area to display the trackball.

Sample.Title: Zooming and Panning
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the zooming and panning features.
